title: my account has been transferred to another region.
body: my account has been transferred to another region. i have tried to log into my account from every region, still nothing. i have the account email. i tried to send a "change password" and it worked, but still i could not log onto any region.

replies.body: I have the same problem. my ID is Dont Love Brut   on EUW server    .please help me!!!

> [{quoted}](name=o0QNMLGB0o,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8PbYNAcP,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-31T03:46:22.969+0000)
>
> I have the same problem. my ID is Dont Love Brut   on EUW server    .please help me!!!

Me too. What's the expected time for a response to the tickets on these kinds of issues?

DTN's advise is spot on with his post.  Please reach out to us by[ submitting a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and we can help with your specific issue individually to find out what's going on.   I also recommend going over those guides in preparation of restoring access and verifying ownership of the account.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!

Please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for assistance with your account. If your account has been compromised, please refer to the [Recovering Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) article, and ensure your email and computer are secure by running a virus scan and changing passwords of the email and any accounts that share information with your League account.

If an account compromise was the issue, please also refer to the [Protecting Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) article to help prevent any compromise in the future.
